create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update mro_equipment_number set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, railways_bureau_id = #{railwaysBureauId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, signal_depot_id = #{signalDepotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, special_railway_line_id = #{specialRailwayLineId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equipment_spare_parts_management_id = #{equipmentSparePartsManagementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rack_number = #{rackNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hierarchy = #{hierarchy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_number = #{equipmentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: en.id as en_id, en.create_by, en.create_time, en.modified_by, en.modified_time, railways_bureau_id, signal_depot_id,special_railway_line_id, station_id,equipment_spare_parts_management_id, rack_number, hierarchy, equipment_number, quantity,configuration, t.tid as t_id,tlj_name, d.did as d_id,dwd_name, x.xid as x_id,xd_name, c.cid as c_id,cz_name, espm.id as espm_id,equipment_name

mro_equipment_number en inner join mro_tieluju t on en.railways_bureau_id=t.tid inner join mro_dianwuduan d on en.signal_depot_id=d.did inner join mro_xianduan x on en.special_railway_line_id=x.xid inner join mro_chezhan c on en.station_id=c.cid inner join mro_equipment_spare_parts_management espm on en.equipment_spare_parts_management_id=espm.id
